title: Slow cooker pork cacciatore
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, sliced', '4 boneless pork chops', '1 (800g) jar pasta sauce', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 green pepper, seeded and sliced into strips', '1 (250g) punnet fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried Italian herbs', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '125ml dry white wine', '4 slices mozzarella cheese']
